name: Venusaur
flavorText:
The plant blooms
when it is
absorbing solar energy. It stays
on the move to
seek sunlight.

previous.name: Ivysaur
previous.flavorText:
When the bulb on
its back grows
large, it appears to lose the
ability to stand
on its hind legs.

next.name: Charmander
next.flavorText:
Obviously prefers
hot places. When
it rains, steam is said to spout
from the tip of
its tail.

pokemon.name: Bulbasaur
pokemon.flavorText:
A strange seed was
planted on its
back at birth. The plant sprouts
and grows with
this POKéMON.

pokemon.name: Ivysaur
pokemon.flavorText:
When the bulb on
its back grows
large, it appears to lose the
ability to stand
on its hind legs.
